title: AWS unveils Trainium3 UltraServers & AI Factories.
content: Delivering up to 4.4× more compute performance than previous generation...
fullContent: Amazon Web Services (AWS) unveiled a suite of new AI & infrastructure products at AWS re:Invent 2025 — including “Trainium3 UltraServers” delivering up to 4.4× more compute performance than previous generation, plus “AI Factories” for enterprises to host dedicated AI infrastructure.

title: AI-driven flows turbo-charge chip design.
content: Major players like Cadence and Samsung are embracing AI-based workflows...
fullContent: Global semiconductor design and manufacturing is being turbo-charged by AI-driven chip design flows, with major players like Cadence Design Systems, Samsung Semiconductor (India R&D arm), and Tessolve embracing AI-based workflows — marking a shift in how complex chips are conceived, verified and built.
